description:
You know what they say. The money is in the list.

But if you are struggling with low email open rates, mediocre click throughs and sales are next to nothing...

You need to know this: few people know that the money is in the RELATIONSHIP with your list.

Of course, email marketing has evolved over the years.

A lot has changed since.

So if you want to

- start boosting your email open rates

- make money without annoying your subscribers

- and keep your subscribers interested with your offers for a long time to come...

Then you owe it to yourself to see this.

We have created a step-by-step training course on how you can do email marketing the EFFECTIVE way.

Whether you are a newbie or you've been doing this for quite some time, you get to watch my screen as I show you things like:

- how to write and schedule your follow up emails for maximum effect

- how to craft emails that get opened

- leveraging Automation rules to segment your subscribers between paid and non-paid

- and more...

These methods apply across the board - whether you're in personal development, online marketing, real estate, and so on...

As long as you have a following, knowing how to hold your audience attention and getting them to act is a skill worth mastering.

And I show you how to do just that.

Click on the Take This Course button to gain instant access now.
title: How to Create successful email marketing campaigns
instructors: Entrepreneur ŸêAcademy, Kenz A.Soliman, Believe Your Dream, Raghda M. Hegazy
